name: MonPro 2000
description:
Allmine Ltd. is pleased to present the MonPro 2000! The MonPro 2000 is the state of the art in vital sign, inventory and minimap monitoring. Order yours now for the low price of only $1699! Act now and we'll even throw in a Beaconator Deluxe, free of charge!

KEY FEATURES

  • Heart rate, stamina, and general well-being monitoring
  • Basic inventory tracking capabilities
  • Fully compatible with our Beaconator line of proximity detection beacons, including our latest model, the Beaconator Deluxe
  • Automapper provides navigational plotting and seamless import of topograhical information via Bluetooth

Try before you buy! Please enjoy this interactive web-based demo of the key features of the MonPro 2000.
